body:
Ω Community Update Ω

By  Administration team 

Howdy

Recent Promotions / Demotions

There have been quite a bit of promotions and demotions / retirements  since our last official community update.


- Sethskye has retired from all positions
- Spooookeh has returned to moderator
- Rinn has stepped down to moderator from senior moderator
- Demur has temp retired from the staff team
- Junr has been promoted to junior moderator
- LFT has been promoted to junior moderator
- Acceqted has been promoted to junior moderator
- Joltz_ has been promoted to junior moderator
- Legoche has been promoted to map developer
- Zintenka has been promoted to map developer
- timaeusTestified has been promoted to map developer
- Posighdun has been promoted to map developer
- PieZ has been promoted to official
- _Nathy has been promoted to official
- Alaan has retired from referee
- Zeusy has been promoted to referee
- Iron has been promoted to ts dev
- VenomousViper has been demoted from ts dev

Tournament News

Tazz has created an information post for the upcoming tournament called "Battle of Eternity". The event team has been working hard to make this happen, and finally it has been announced that the tournament will start on June 1st. If you have any questions regarding this tournament, Edans has made a Q&A post. The last tourney date is July 9th.

Atlas Updates

CTF, scoreboxes, wools, objectives and monuments have been completed. The map devs are hard at work to translate over to the XML code for maps, as well as helping to make maps for our new gamemodes. The map developers are making departments to help organize themselves. Testing servers will be made soon, once more progress has been made on the update. Keep updated with the updates on our revisions page. 

Mentoring Returns
We have re-added mentor to help with junior moderators. They will be given a bunch of jobs to do over the next while, to help with the improving and training of our staff team. The following are mentors - 
- Cammy_G
- FrostedCupcakez
- VenomousViper
- Jahaj
- _Nathy
- PresidentBadger
- Sho
- Stimulating
- Tazz
- Vobaseball12

Possible server partnership

Avicus could possibly be pairing up with another server network in order to strengthen the two communities. More on this will be released soon. Avicus will not be merging, but rather they will be organising  events, and connecting to their communities.

Avicus Community Slack

The Administrator team is still encouraging you all to join community slack, just remember to contact an admin to be added to it! Thanks to PieZ, we have official rules in place now that users will have to stick to, although they are quite straight forward. In addition to this Jahaj has been promoted to Community Administrator!

General Rules:
  • No links to pornography, phishing sites, keyloggers, scams, etc.(3 Points)
  • No harassing users in all chats(Depends how bad. Talk to over staff about it)
  • No rumors/drama. We're trying to get away from that.(1 Point)
  • Try to remain calm and civilized in situations.(1 Point)
  • No death threats or threatening to Ddos (3 Points)
  • We have a three strike limit. These strikes will be removed if the strike was given on an older date and the staff feels it has been a long enough time
  • Making a leaving thread will get you kicked out of slack. Unless stated that you do not wish to leave.
  • Each room has different levels of it being moderated. Low moderated means the channel is very lenient. Medium moderated means the channel will be regularly moderated. Highly moderated means it will be very strict with moderators .

Channels

  • #announcements(Highly Moderated) •Do not post in this channel unless otherwise told to by an admin. If you wish to discuss what is said on the announcements, please talk about it in #general
  • #avicus(Medium Moderated)
  • #competitive (Medium moderated)
  • #feedback(Highly Moderated)
  • #games(Medium Moderated)
  • #general(Medium Moderated)
  • #help (Highly moderated)
  • #map-making (Medium moderated)
  • #music
    • •Do not post Music that is harmful to others ears or disturbing
  • #random(Low Moderated)

That's all for now folks!

replies.body:
Just stop.

I'm going to be completely honest, trying to act hard over the forums of a minecraft block game server is not a very smart thing to do. It's immature and will result in another forum punishment. 

Don't want that do you?
replies.body_tagged:

reply_to.body:
xD I play about 3 hours a week at most. I usually spend my days working out, with friends, at the pool, basketball or football, etc. If you don't believe me, feel free to ask some people I snapchat such as Lokigh, CraftingTheory, Buster, Vlad, etc

I don't care for these arguments anymore. I don't care about some opinion from a kid who's insult towards me is "Keyboard Warrior". Thank you, and cheerio lad
